name: Hot Buttered Chai
description: As with any variation on hot buttered rum, this drink is about execution. Using a simple batter made of creamed butter and brown sugar makes sure you get the flavor of the butter without the dreaded oil slick on the top of your cocktail.
recipeIngredient: One 2 1/2 inch piece fresh ginger, peeled and sliced into 4 pieces

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl cream butter and brown sugar together with a wooden spoon until evenly incorporated. Divide between 4 mugs.
Place ginger and teabags in a heatsafe dish. Pour 16 ounces of boiling water over and let steep for 4 minutes, then strain.
Pour two ounces of brandy in each mug then pour 4 ounces of steeped tea over top. Mix with a spoon until batter is full melted into the tea, then serve immediately.
